content: pattern can be found for free on my linked blog 1 beginner friendly amigurimi pattern pdf is 5 pages long in english and uses us crochet terms final product is about 5 inches long but dimensions vary according to the maker s gauge will take about 3 hours to finish perfect for a last minute gift 1 https //www grumpy-granny com/2019/12/23/baby-yoda-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/
